Class InProgressOrderItem

java.lang.Object
ui.InProgressOrderItem
public class InProgressOrderItem extends Object
The InProgressOrderIem Class represents an inventory item in the in progress order table, complete with all of the attributes from the inventory table
Since:
2024-10-18

  • Constructor Details

    • InProgressOrderItem

      public InProgressOrderItem(Integer itemCode, String description, Double unitCost, Integer orderedQTY, Double total)
      This is the constructor method which creates the in progress order item by assigning its attributes
      Parameters:
      itemCode - the item code of the item.
      description - the description of the item.
      unitCost - the unit cost of the item.
      orderedQTY - the amount of stock of the item ordered.
      total - total cost of the number of these items ordered.

  • Method Details

    • setController

      public void setController(InventoryOrderingController controller)
      This is the setController method which sets the controller so that the inventory ordering page can be referenced
      Parameters:
      controller - the inventory ordering page controller.
